manifests.contents:
bench = []
test = []
example = []

[[bin]]
path = "src/main.rs"
name = "chowner-rs"
test = true
doctest = true
bench = true
doc = true
plugin = false
proc-macro = false
harness = true
edition = "2021"
required-features = []

[package]
name = "chowner-rs"
edition = "2021"
version = "0.0.1"
autobins = true
autoexamples = true
autotests = true
autobenches = true

[dependencies]
anyhow = "1.0.68"
file-owner = "0.1.1"
posix-acl = "1.1.0"
rayon = "1.6.1"
xattr = "1.0.0"

[dependencies.clap]
version = "4.1.4"
features = ["derive", "cargo"]

[dependencies.nix]
version = "0.26.2"
features = ["fs"]

skeleton.lock_file:
version = 3
